name: VirusTotal_GetReport
author: CERT-BDF, StrangeBee
description: Get the latest VirusTotal report for a file, hash, domain or an IP address.

configurationItems.name: polling_interval
configurationItems.description: Define time interval between two requests attempts for the report

configurationItems.name: rescan_hash_older_than_days
configurationItems.description: Rescan hash observable if report is older than selected days

configurationItems.name: highlighted_antivirus
configurationItems.description: Add taxonomy if selected AV don't recognize observable

configurationItems.name: download_sample
configurationItems.description: Download automatically sample as observable when looking for hash

configurationItems.name: download_sample_if_highlighted
configurationItems.description: Download automatically sample as observable if highlighted antivirus didn't recognize
